mapper.select:
select u.school_num as "user.schoolNum", u.`name` as "user.name", u.sex as "user.sex", u.grade as "user.grade", u.class_code as "user.classCode", a.activity_id as "actovityId", a.content, a.location, a.post_time as "postTime" from t_activity a, t_user u where a.school_num=u.school_num order by a.post_time desc
limit ${start},${count}
select count(*) as num from t_activity a, t_user u where a.school_num=u.school_num
